channel.title: Amit Blonder on Matt Eichhorn
channel.description: Recent content in Amit Blonder on Matt Eichhorn

item.title: Kaleidoscope: An Efficient, Learnable Representation for all Structured Linear Maps
item.description: We introduce a family of matrices that provably capture any structured matrix with near-optimal parameter and arithmetic operation complexity. We empirically validate that these matrices can be automatically learned within end-to-end pipelines to improve model quality.
